statements: INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, country_of_origin, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italy', 'Spaghetti, Eggs, Guanciale, Pecorino Cheese, Black Pepper', '1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a separate bowl, mix eggs with grated cheese. 3. Cook guanciale in a pan. 4. Mix everything together. 5. Serve hot.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_name, ingredients, instructions, country_of_origin, recipe_id) VALUES ('Pad Thai', 'Rice Noodles, Tofu, Bean Sprouts, Peanuts, Eggs, Tamarind Sauce', '1. Soak rice noodles in warm water. 2. Stir-fry tofu and eggs. 3. Add noodles and tamarind sauce. 4. Mix in bean sprouts and peanuts. 5. Serve with a lime wedge.', 'Thailand', 2);

INSERT INTO recipes VALUES (3, 'Sushi Rolls', 'Japan', 'Sushi Rice, Nori, Raw Fish, Vegetables, Soy Sauce, Wasabi', '1. Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar. 2. Place nori on a bamboo mat. 3. Add rice and fillings. 4. Roll and slice. 5. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_name, country_of_origin, ingredients, instructions, recipe_id) VALUES ('Chicken Tikka Masala', 'India', 'Chicken, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Tomato, Cream, Spices', '1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill chicken. 3. Prepare tomato cream sauce. 4. Add grilled chicken. 5. Serve with rice or naan bread.', 4);

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, country_of_origin, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (5, 'Moussaka', 'Greece', 'Eggplant, Potatoes, Ground Meat, Bechamel Sauce, Cheese', '1. Layer eggplant and potatoes. 2. Cook ground meat and layer over vegetables. 3. Pour bechamel sauce. 4. Add cheese on top. 5. Bake until golden brown.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, country_of_origin, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Bolognese', 'Italy', 'Spaghetti, ground beef, tomatoes, onions, garlic', '1. Boil water and cook spaghetti. 2. Brown ground beef. 3. Mix beef with tomato sauce. 4. Serve over spaghetti.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_name, country_of_origin, ingredients, instructions, recipe_id) VALUES ('Chicken Curry', 'India', 'Chicken, curry paste, coconut milk, onions, garlic', '1. Cut chicken into pieces. 2. Cook chicken with curry paste. 3. Add coconut milk. 4. Simmer until chicken is cooked.', 2);

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredients, instructions, country_of_origin) VALUES (3, 'Caesar Salad', 'Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing, chicken (optional)', '1. Chop lettuce and chicken. 2. Add croutons, cheese, and dressing. 3. Toss well before serving.', 'USA');

INSERT INTO recipes (country_of_origin, recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredients, instructions) VALUES ('Japan', 4, 'Sushi Rolls', 'Sushi rice, nori seaweed, cucumber, avocado, crab sticks', '1. Prepare sushi rice. 2. Lay nori, add rice and fillings. 3. Roll carefully. 4. Slice and serve.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_name, recipe_id, country_of_origin, instructions, ingredients) VALUES ('Banana Bread', 5, 'Global', '1. Mash bananas. 2. Mix with sugar, flour, eggs, and baking soda. 3. Bake until golden brown.', 'Ripe bananas, sugar, flour, eggs, baking soda');
INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, cuisine_type, recipe_instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italian', 'Cook spaghetti, mix with egg, cheese, and pancetta.')

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, cuisine_type, recipe_instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italian', 'Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a separate pan, cook pancetta until crispy. Mix cooked pancetta with beaten eggs, grated cheese, and cooked spaghetti. Serve hot.')

INSERT INTO recipes (dish_name, cuisine_type, recipe_instructions, recipe_id) VALUES ('Tacos', 'Mexican', 'Grill tortillas until warm. Fill tortillas with seasoned beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and salsa. Enjoy! ', 2)
